root.name: Stasis
root.description: OverviewStasis is an upcoming sci-fi/horror point and click adventure game developed entirely by Chris Bischoff under the banner of The Brotherhood Games. It is currently set to be released on PC. After initial reluctance from the developer, Stasis is going to launch a Kickstarter and Steam Greenlight campaign in late October 2013.System RequirementsPCWindows 8/Windows 7/Windows Vista/Windows XP (via a DLL download).2.0 GHz+ Processor.1 GB RAM.10-20 GB Hard Disk Disk Space.512 MB Video Card.MacOSX 10.7, 10.8 10.9.At least a Corei3 4 gigs RAM.
